public class Nao.DCM
extends java.lang.Object

Manage link with devices (sensors and actuators). See specific documentation.

wait

public org.json.JSONObject wait(int id,
                                int timeoutperiod)
Wait for the end of a long running method that was called using 'post'

Parameters:
id - The ID of the method that was returned when calling the method using 'post'
timeoutPeriod - The timeout period in ms. To wait indefinately, use a timeoutPeriod of zero.
Actual SDK return value:True if the timeout period terminated. False if the method returned.
Returns:
JSONObject which contains the following values as strings:
  • the actual return value (returnvalue)
  • exceptions (exception)
  • standard out (stdout)
  • standard err (err)

id - The ID of the method that was returned when calling the method using 'post'
Actual SDK return value:True if if the method is currently running.
Returns:

preferences

public org.json.JSONObject preferences(java.lang.String action,
                                       java.lang.String target,
                                       java.lang.String keyname,
                                       java.lang.String keyvalue)
Save updated value from DCM in XML pref file

Parameters:
action - string : 'Save' 'Load' 'Add'
target - string : 'Chest' 'Head' 'Main' 'All'
keyName - The name of the key if action = 'Add'.
keyValue - The ALVAlue of the key to add
Actual SDK return value: Nothing
Returns:
JSONObject which contains the following values as strings:
  • the actual return value (returnvalue)
  • exceptions (exception)
  • standard out (stdout)
  • standard err (err)
